title: Champion for me?
body:
I'm not good at this game and I wanted to know which champion could suit me. I'm currently playing as Azir but I sometimes get bored of the same repeated combo of shurima shuffle.
Pls help{{item:3070}}

replies.body: Zilean top. Really strong, would suit your playstyle.

Thanks, I like Azir because he can control the field and in the laning phase he can poke really well.
I also like how he can still deal tons of damage from the back.
Ty :)

Then your looking at your control mages, being Orianna, Anivia, Ziggs.

Anivia is slightly short ranged though and tends to be closer to the fights, but Ori and Ziggs can sit pretty far back and still be useful.

It would be helpful if you told us what you like about Azir. Here's what I think you might enjoy playing anyways though.

1. Viktor. He has a lot of damage, and scales really well at all stages of the game like Azir.

2. Heimerdinger. His turret mechanics are a basic version of Azir soldiers in a way. He also has a super dominant laning phase against melee champions, like Azir.

3. Lee Sin. He's not a mid-laner but he has similar play making combos to Azir's Shurima Shuffle. Look up "insec combo".
